title: KN95 Face Masks
description: Similar to the N95, these masks filter 95% of all 0.3 micron particles in the air. They are the ‘go-to’ standard of face masks. These are great for longer term use, and are much more comfortable to be worn for extended periods. They offer superior filtration too, so they are recommended for any potential increase to airborne viruses or bacteria.

title: 3-ply Disposable Protective Face Masks
description: Ready to use when you need to pop into a shop or on your daily commute, these disposable masks ensure sure you always have a fresh mask when you need one. Sourced for Curakit by Harley Street Care and provided in sterile 10-piece packs, these medical-grade face masks are certified to EN 14683 standards.

title: Alcohol-based Hand Sanitiser
description: In a handy pocket-sized bottle, the Curakit hand sanitiser uses 70% alcohol, and is BS EN 1276 tested to provide 99.999% bacteria protection. Its special formula is light, quick drying and lightly fragranced.
ingredients: Alcohol Denat.*, Aqua (Water), Propylene Glycol, Carbomer, Triethanolamine, Malaleuca Alternifolia (Tea Tree) Leaf Oil, Limonene

title: Luxury Hand Cream - White Lily & Amber
description: Lightly fragrances with white lily and amber, this luxurious moisturising hand cream helps keep hands feeling soft and refreshed
ingredients: Aqua (Water), Cetearyl Alcohol, Glycerin, Isopropyl Palmitate, Glyceryl Stearate, PEG-100 Stearate, Dimethicone, Parfum (Fragrance), Polyquaternium-37, Olea Europaea (Olive) Fruit Oil, Prunus Amygdalus Dulcis (Sweet Almond) Oil, Polyquaternium-11, Carbomer, Ethylhexylglycerin, Panthenol, Disodium EDTA, Tocopheryl Acetate, Sodium Hydroxide, Mel Extract, Sambucus Nigra Flower Extract, Phenoxyethanol, Potassium Sorbate, Sodium Benzoate, Linalool, Coumarin, Citronellol, Butylphenyl Methylpropional, Citral, Geraniol.

title: Hair and Body Wash - Honey & Vanilla
description: A light hair and body wash, enriched with shea butter to leave hair and skin soft, smooth and hydrated.
ingredients: Aqua (Water), Sodium Laureth Sulfate, Sodium Chloride, Cocamidopropyl Betaine, Glycerin, PEG-4 Rapeseedamide, Parfum (Fragrance), Glycol Distearate, Laureth-4, Styrene/Acrylates Copolymer, Mel (Honey), Benzophenone-4, Citric Acid, Polysorbate 20, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter Extract, Sodium Benzoate, Potassium Sorbate, Formic Acid, Coumarin, CI 15985 (Yellow 6), CI 19140 (Yellow 5)

title: Choccy Scoffy Truffles
description: The original rich & chocolatey cocoa dusted truffles coated with a generous dusting of exquisite bitter-sweet cocoa powder.
ingredients: Vegetable Oils (Coconut, Palm Kernel) 43.5%, Sugar 32.7%, Fat Reduced Cocoa Powder 13.4%, Whey Powder (from MILK) 8.9%, Cocoa Powder 1%, Emulsifier (SOYA Lecithin) 0.5%

title: Berry Bubbly Truffles
description: A fruity berry cocoa dusted truffle packed with fun popping candy, a flavour explosion for your taste buds!
ingredients: Vegetable Oils (Coconut, Palm Kernel), Sugar, Fat Reduced Cocoa Powder, Whey Powder (from Milk), Popping Candy (5%) {Sugar, Lactose, (Milk), Cocoa Butter, Glucose Syrup, Carbon Dioxide} Cocoa Powder, Emulsifier (Soya Lecithin), Natural Flavourings

title: Flutterscotch Truffles
description: Divine cocoa dusted truffles with creamy Butterscotch chips and a cheeky hint of sea salt.
ingredients: Vegetable oils (coconut, palm kernel), sugar, fat reduced cocoa powder, wheypowder (from milk), butterscotch chips (5%)(sugar, glucose syrup, milk, cream [milk], salted butter (butter [milk], salt), sea salt, emulsifiers (lecithins, sucrose esters of fatty acids)) , cocoa powder, emulsifier (soya lecithin), flavouring.

title: Finest Assam Tea
description: Distinctive malty flavour, with a bold invigorating character. Drink black or with milk. One cup = 2-3g per cup. Comes with stainless steel tea strainer included
ingredients: Whole Leaf Assam Tea

title: Breakfast Blend Loose Tea
description: Malty, light and refreshing. Great with milk. Blended from Assam, Ceylon and Darjeeling teas. One cup = 2-3g per cup. Comes with stainless steel tea strainer included
ingredients: Assam Tea, Ceylon Tea, Darjeeling Tea

title: Whole Chamomile Flower Tea
description: This fragrant, delicate, floral infusion has so many benefits. Chamomile tea has traditionally been used to help you relax, boost your immune system and cure a multitude of physical and emotional health concerns. One cup = 2-3g per cup. Comes with stainless steel tea strainer included
ingredients: Whole Chamomile flowers

title: Red Berry Tea
description: Including Hibiscus, Rosehip, Apple Pieces and Orange Peels. The liquor is bright with a beautiful bouquet and superb fruity flavour. It is naturally caffeine free and extremely refreshing. One cup = 2-3g per cup. Comes with stainless steel tea strainer included

title: Lemon & Ginger Infusion Tea
description: This lemon and ginger infusion is a great way to relax when it’s cold outside and there’s nothing you want more than a nice warm drink. One cup = 2-3g per cup. Comes with stainless steel tea strainer included

title: Moroccan Mint Tea
description: A wonderful blend of gunpowder green tea and mint tea. Traditionally drunk in glass tea cups with sugar. One cup = 2-3g per cup. Comes with stainless steel tea strainer included

title: Alcohol Free Hand and Surface Cleaning Wipes
description: Certified to BS EN 1276, these alcohol-free wipes are great for cleaning hands and surfaces. Whether wiping down your desk, the table in a cafe, or the supermarket shopping trolley, these are an essential item to keep on you when out and about.

title: Relaxation Remedy Roller
description: A de-stressing oil blend of Bergamot, Frankincense, Lavender, Geranium and Orange. Specially blended by On The Lane London, this roller stick can be used throughout the day to comfort, relax and enhance and body, and it contains a number of naturally occurring ingredients that give it antibacterial properties too. You can add it to body lotions, aromatherapy diffusers or even the bath.
ingredients: Fractionated coconut oil, lavender oil, bergamot oil, geranium oil, frankincense oil, orange oil, citral, citronellol, geraniol, limonene, linalool (Nauturally occurring constituents of the essential oils)

title: Aromatherapy Sleep Spray
description: A relaxing blend of Lavender, Ylang Ylang and Roman Chamomile to promote a peaceful and serene atmosphere.
ingredients: Alcohol Denat., Aqua (Water), Lavandula Angustifolia (Lavender Oil), Anthemis nobilis (Roman Chamomile Oil), Canada odorata (Ylang Ylang Flower Oil), PEG-40 Hydrogenated Castor Oil, Linalool, Limonene, Geraniol, Farnesol, Benzyl Benzoate

title: Aromatherapy Energising Room Spray
description: An envigorationg blend of botanicals including geranium, citrus oils and mint oils to envigorate and energise your space.
ingredients: Alcohol Denat., Aqua (Water), fragrance, PEG-40 Hydrogenated Castor Oil.

title: Restorative Hand Salve for Men
description: The ultimate restorative skin healer with beeswax, natural oils and botanicals for hard worked hands.
ingredients: Cocos nutifera (coconut oil), prunus Amygdalus Dulcis (sweet almond oil), Olea europaea (Olive) Fruit Oil, Cera Alba ( beeswax), Butyrospermum parkii (Shea Butter). Citrus aurantium var.bergamia (Bergamot) Oil, Andropogon zizanioides (Vetivert) Oil, Eucalyptus globulus (Eucalyptus) oil, Santalum spicatum (Sandalwood) Oil.

title: Vitamin and Protein Snack Balls - Mixed
description: High protein natural snack balls with vitamins and vegan options. High in fibre and made in the UK. Flavours: Cherry Bakewell, Peanut Butter, Coconut and Macadamia, Lemon and Pistachio, Coffee Oat.

title: Vitamin and Protein Snack Balls - Single
description: High protein natural snack balls with vitamins and vegan options. High in fibre and made in the UK. Flavours: Cherry Bakewell, Lemon and Pistachio, Coffee Oat. 45g per bag.

title: Butter Mints
description: Delicious, hand-made butter mints specially made for Curakit in the UK. A real crowd pleaser! Comes in a natural fibre re-useable pouch
ingredients: Sugar, Glucose Syrup, Citric Acid, Flavourings, Colours (E110, E171, E153, E132).

title: Chocolate Coins
description: Milk Chocolate coins that are an all year round pleaser.
ingredients: Sugar, whole milk powder, cocoa mass, cocoa butter, whey powder, emulsifier: soya lecithen; natural vanilla flavour. May contain trace nuts and gluten.

title: Breakfast Pots
description: Super healthy instant porridge breakfast pots that are naturally high in fibre, no added sugar, dairy and gluten free. The best way to start the day!

title: Punchy Funhouse
description: Bringing the tropical beach to you! Open the bottle and serve over ice with the garnishes provided. ABV 9.4%. Made in London by expert mixologists, these single serving cocktails in a bottle are a delicious Friday treat.
ingredients: Brandy, Rum, Peach and Tea

title: Espresso Martini
description: Vodka, Espresso, Coffee Liquor - Chill. Shake to get the foam and serve straight into a glass. Made in London by expert mixologists, these single serving cocktails in a bottle are a delicious Friday treat.

title: The Paloma
description: The Mexican beauty - spicy and refreshing.Pour over ice in a long glass. Rim the glass with salt and chilli and garnish with dehydrated grapefruit (provided by us). ABV: 9.0% Made in London by expert mixologists, these single serving cocktails in a bottle are a delicious Friday treat.
ingredients: Tequila, Ting/Soda and Grapefruit

title: Chelsea Collins
description: Fresh British flavours to your doorstep. Pour over ice and garnish with Jalapeño and cucumber (provided). ABV 9.8%. Made in London by expert mixologists, these single serving cocktails in a bottle are a delicious Friday treat.
ingredients: Gin, Elderflower, Cucumber and Mint

title: The Cooler
description: Watermelony summer yummy cocktail! Chill, shake and pour over ice in a long glass with garnish provided. ABV 7.1%. Made in London by expert mixologists, these single serving cocktails in a bottle are a delicious Friday treat.
ingredients: Gin, Watermelon, Hibiscus Tea

title: Matcha Nojito (No ABV)
description: Fun over and over without the hangover. Pour over ice in a long glass and garnish with the fruit provided. ABV 0.0%. Made in London by expert mixologists, these single serving cocktails in a bottle are a delicious non-alcoholic Friday treat.
ingredients: Homemade allspice mix, Mactha tea, Citrus

title: The Virgin Marga (No ABV)
description: The not-so boozy Central American. Pour over ice in a long/short glass and garnish. ABV 0.0%. Made in London by expert mixologists, these single serving cocktails in a bottle are a delicious non-alcoholic Friday treat.
ingredients: Pea flower Tea, Kafir leave syrup, All spice and Citrus

title: Cocktail Selection
description: A mix of three or five of the best selling cocktails by lolipop Have a random selection or specify the selection of your choice. Made in London by expert mixologists, these single serving cocktails in a bottle are a delicious Friday treat.

title: It's Just Mercury in Retrograde - Mindfulness Journal
description: Light, encouraging, and beautiful, the It's Just Mercury in Retrograde Journal is the perfect way to banish any celestial chaos and bring out the good vibes. Missed your train? Spilled coffee on your shirt? Nothing going right in your life? It's not your fault - IT'S JUST MERCURY IN RETROGRADE! What better way to embrace this seasonal phenomenon than with a beautiful journal that says it all? This vibrant journal is filled with encouraging prompts, colorful lined pages, and lush illustrations to offer a bit of celestial encouragement. Mercury retrograde is thought to be a good time to work on self-improvement, so whether it's that time of year or you're simply in need of a pep talk, a cosmic reset, or just a place to write it all out, this journal is here for you.

title: 99 Things That Bring Me Joy - Mindfulness Journal
description: What brings you joy? Is it the scent of spring rain? Warm towels from the dryer? Potato chips in your sandwich? Your definition of happiness is as unique as your fingerprints. This guided journal provides 99 prompts to help you make a list of things that you hold dear: a sentimental possession, your best traveling companion, your favorite type of weather, a compliment you've received, and an achievement well-earned. Filling in the journal will immediately boost your mood, and flipping through it later is a wonderful reminder of life's distinctive pleasures. It is also a wonderful gift for milestone events such as birthdays, graduation, and retirement.

title: One Line A Day (Floral Edition) - Mindfulness Journal
description: This hard cover new version of our classic bestselling One Line a Day memory book features vibrant floral watercolor artwork on its cover and within. With foil-stamped accents, gilded page edges, and a silky ribbon marker, this strikingly beautiful five-year diary brings unexpected joy and reflection to each day, and makes an exceptional gift for Mother's Day, graduations, and all sorts of springlike celebrations.

title: One Sketch A Day (Horizons Edition) - Mindfulness Journal
description: Start a daily creative practice in style. This bold version of the popular One Sketch a Day features gold accents and cover artwork that will inspire new creative journeys. This sketchbook offers space to doodle, build drawing skills, or document experiences every day for a year. Once completed, it becomes a keepsake archive of a year's worth of artistic explorations. Featuring stunning cover artwork by SpaceFrog Designs, gilded page edges, and a ribbon marker, this handsome visual journal makes a thoughtful gift for budding sketchers and practiced artists alike.

title: One Line A Day (Rainbow Edition) - Mindfulness Journal
description: Featuring the rainbow-like paintings of Kindah Khalidy, this vibrant version of the beloved One Line a Day journal is a cheerful way to capture five years of memories. This stunning memory book is a simple and rewarding way to reflect and record. The pages offer space to write a brief line each day, while allowing you to compare today's events with your notes from the same date in years past. With exuberant artwork by Kindah Khalidy on the cover and interior, and with foil accents and a ribbon page marker, this keepsake journal will brighten all your days.

title: Two Minute Mornings - Mindfulness Book
description: The choices made in the morning can have a huge impact all day long. The creator of the bestselling BOOK OF AWESOME and JOURNAL OF AWESOME encourages users to win the day in just a few minutes each morning. The simple, quick prompts-focusing on gratitude, letting go of stress, and setting daily intentions-are proven to increase happiness and set readers up for success every day.

title: Am I Overthinking This? - Mindfulness Book
description: The choices made in the morning can have a huge impact all day long. The creator of the bestselling BOOK OF AWESOME and JOURNAL OF AWESOME encourages users to win the day in just a few minutes each morning. The simple, quick prompts-focusing on gratitude, letting go of stress, and setting daily intentions-are proven to increase happiness and set readers up for success every day.

title: Face Fitness - Mindfulness Book
description: Simple Exercises and Rituals for Toned, Glowing Skin. at Pretty meets 7 Minutes to Fit in this simple-to-follow guide to facial exercises and clean beauty techniques for healthy, radiant skin. Take your skin care to the next level with this guide to toning, sculpting, and strengthening your skin using simple, natural techniques. Within these pages, you'll discover facial stretches, massage exercises, meditative affirmations, and clean beauty tips from industry experts that will instantly rejuvenate your complexion. The 50 easy-to-follow exercises range from the Cheekbone Press for a rosy glow to the Bright Eyes to reduce puffiness and the Jawline Squeeze to ease tension. With how-to illustrations and empowering mantras, this book is for women looking to enhance their natural beauty routine.

title: After the Rain - Mindfulness Book
description: In this soulful collection, celebrated self-care storyteller Alexandra Elle delivers 15 lessons on how to overcome obstacles, build confidence, and cultivate abundance - no matter what life throws your way. Part memoir, part guide, Elle shares stirring stories of her own remarkable journey from self- doubt to self-love - from her teenage years as a directionless, overwhelmed single mom to her current life as a successful entrepreneur and happily married mother of three. Written with her signature candor and warmth, Elle delivers illuminating reflections on loss, fear, bravery, healing, love, acceptance, and more - plus empowering affirmations and meditations for readers to practice in their own lives.

title: You Will Leave a Trail of Stars - Mindfulness Book
description: This book provides all the advice you need for taking the world by storm, from the inimitable Lisa Congdon. In this illustrated guide to life - perfect for graduates and other seekers - acclaimed artist and educator Lisa Congdon offers up wisdom and insights for living. Each inspirational quote, lesson, and piece of advice is brought to life by Congdon's signature illustration style, making the book a beautiful gift or keepsake. Whether you're starting a new chapter of your own story, or simply searching for ways to live with more intention, curiosity, and joy, this book will inspire you to connect with yourself and prepare for any adventure life might have in store.
